content.prompt: Which of the following can replace /* missing code */ so that this code segment works as intended?

choices.label:
while (scan.hasNext())
{
   String temp = scan.next().substring(0, 1);
   usernames.add(temp + scan.next());
}

while (scan.hasNext())
{
   String one = scan.next();
   String two = scan.next();
   usernames.add(two.substring(0, 1) + one);
}

while (scan.hasNext())
{
   String[] temp = scan.next().split("-");
   usernames.add(temp[1].substring(0, 1) + temp[0]);
}

while (scan.hasNext())
{
   String[] temp = scan.next().split("-");
   usernames.add(temp[0].substring(0, 1) + temp[1]);
}

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
